class.name: TouchScreenButton
class.description: Button for touch screen devices. You can set it to be visible on all screens, or only on touch devices.

method.name: is_pressed
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this button is currently pressed.

members.member: The button's action. Actions can be handled with [InputEventAction].
The button's texture for the normal state.
The button's texture for the pressed state.
If [code]true[/code] the button's shape is centered.
If [code]true[/code] the button's shape is visible.
The button's visibility mode. See [code]VISIBILITY_*[/code] constants.

signal.name: pressed
signal.description: Emitted when the button is pressed (down).

signal.name: released
signal.description: Emitted when the button is released (up).
